properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 2:43AM PST until February 14 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...SNOW DEVELOPING LATER TODAY OVER THE CASCADE CREST AND CENTRAL
IDAHO PANHANDLE MOUNTAINS...

* WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations
of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Mullan, Dobson Pass, and Lookout Pass.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...1 to 3 inches of snow will be possible
across the Silver Valley.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET
